description: System-generated unique key for this schedule status record.
Human-readable schedule status identifier used in the application.
Detailed explanation of the status and its intended use.
Boolean flag indicating the default status for new schedules.
Boolean flag to exclude this status from selection lists.
Boolean flag to exclude this status from reports and dashboards.
Flag indicating whether preventive maintenance work orders are generated for schedules in this status.
Free-text notes or remarks about this status.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp when a user last changed this record; likely overlaps with other audit fields; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record.
Date and time when this record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Date and time when this record was last modified.
